fields.label: Type
fields.description: Optional media to display above the question.

semantics.label: Task description
semantics.description: Explain to your students what's expected of them.

fields.label: Hints
fields.description: Optionally add hints or particular instructions for this section.

fields.label: Weight
fields.description: Enter the weight of this section relative to other sections.

semantics.label: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: Slack
fields.description: Percentage of slack that's acceptable for a section's length.

fields.label: Minimum text length
fields.description: Define an absolute minimum total text length.

fields.label: Maximum text length
fields.description: Define an absolute maximum total text length.

fields.label: Feedback mode
fields.description: Decide whether you want to display feedback while typing or only when the student requests it.

fields.label: All sections good
fields.description: Feedback text shown when all sections are of tolerable length.
fields.default: Your sections' lengths are all fine.

fields.label: Section too short
fields.description: Feedback text shown for sections that are too short (@title will be replaced by the section title, @chars will be replaced by the number of characters missing).
fields.default: Your section "@title" is too short. You need at least @chars more characters.

fields.label: Section too long
fields.description: Feedback text shown for sections that are too long (@title will be replaced by the section title, @chars will be replaced by the number of characters needing removal).
fields.default: Your section "@title" is too long. Remove at least @chars characters.

fields.label: Section too short (when typing)
fields.description: Status shown when typing for sections that are too short (@chars will be replaced by the number of characters missing).

fields.label: Section too long (when typing)
fields.description: Status shown when typing for sections that are too long (@chars will be replaced by the number of characters needing removal).

fields.label: Text copied to clipboard
fields.default: Your text was copied to the clipboard

fields.label: Cannot copy to clipboard
fields.default: Your text could not be copied to the clipboard

fields.label: Text for "No section" message
fields.default: There was no section given for this structure strip.
